1.title: Find Your Representatives
1.subtitle: Here you can find your representatives, how to contact them, bills they’ve introduced, committees they serve on, and political contributions they’ve received.

1.title: Esusu
1.subtitle: Forbes Under 30 social entrepreneurs, Nigerian-born entrepreneur Wemimo and his business partner Goel co-founded Esusu in 2019. The mobile platform helps individuals mostly from marginalized communities save money, access capital and build credit.

2.title: Jarvis Boards
2.subtitle: Jarvis Boards' mission has always been to craft paddle boards in Austin, Texas that are environmentally friendly, look great, and perform well. To accomplish this, we employ a wide range of techniques to craft our small-batch production wooden SUPs in our Austin studio.

products.name: Hollow Core Paddle Board Frame Kits
products.description: There is something magical about creating something with your own two hands. Building your own hollow core paddle board will be one of the most rewarding projects that you'll tackle.

products.name: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hat
products.description: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hats aren't just for dads. This one's got a low profile with an adjustable strap and curved visor. Available in khaki and light blue.

products.name: Surf Wax Candle
products.description: We teamed up with our friends at Jimbo's Surf Wax to create a unique line of surf wax candles. Each candle is slow cooked over a wood stove in Maine using surf wax and a hint of coconut.

2.title: Gentleman AF
2.subtitle: Gentleman AF is a beard care line featuring a beard wash, beard oils, and beard balms for classy men with a dash of savagery.

products.name: Beard Balms
products.description: Scoop a dime sized amount of beard balm with your finger and place it in the palm of your hands. Rub it between both palms until it melts. Apply it to your beard, comb it down and style as desired.

products.name: Beard Wash
products.description: Wet your face and neck, place a small amount of beard wash in the palm of your hands and massage it into your beard and face, including your neck. Rinse your beard thoroughly.

products.name: Beard Oils
products.description: Shake well before use. Drop a dime sized amount of beard oil in the palm of your hands. Rub your hands and apply the oil from your skin to the tip of your beard.

3.title: Shop Thoughtful
3.subtitle: thoughtful is a nonprofit that seeks to promote black businesses and create a one-stop-shop for consumers who want to vote with their wallets. thoughtful does not take any commissions off of the businesses it promotes, it is purely a hub designed to uplift and support established Black-owned businesses online.

products.name: Olivia Twist Headband
products.description: This is timeless versatility. Two loops of our cotton fabric linked at center. An alluring piece for easy, low maintenance styles.

products.name: Black Trans Lives
products.description: #BlackTransLivesMatter

products.name: Nano-Ionic Facial Steamer
products.description: Facial steam combined with ionic water particles is up to 10x more effective than other facial steamers in penetrating the skin.

3.title: Sweet Pea Books Inc
3.subtitle: Sweet Pea Books is dedicated to producing multicultural books that expose, inspire, amuse, and foster a love of reading in all children. Sweet Pea Books aims to promote the development of good character by teaching values through literature as well as expose young readers to different cultures.

products.name: D Is For Dragon Fruit (Hardcover)
products.description: D is for Dragon Fruit is a vibrantly illustrated, exotic fruit alphabet book that exposes children to a variety of nutritious fruits, reinforces the alphabet and expands a child’s knowledge of the world.

products.name: When Mama Braids My Hair (Hardcover)
products.description: When Mama Braids My Hair captures a young girl’s experience of having her hair braided and the bond it creates with her mother. The tradition of African hair braiding is more than just a Sunday routine. Come join Nikki on an adventure as she is transformed into an Egyptian queen, a Nigerian goddess, a Zulu warrior, and a Maasai girl.

products.name: Elephants Don't Have Stripes! (COMING SOON!)
products.description: Elephants Don’t Have Stripes! Deep in the valley, in the dry grasslands of the African savanna, a young elephant admires other animals for their beauty. He yearns to look and act more like them. One by one, each wish comes true and the young elephant couldn’t be happier.

4.title: Marie Hunter Beauty
4.subtitle: Cosmetics and Fragrances for the Modern Muse. Boldly empowering women with beauty, confidence and class since 2016.

products.name: Queen Lipstick
products.description: Intense matte, super-rich formula delivers vibrant color with a velvety texture and long lasting comfort. A nourishing blend of oils and butters condition and soften lips. Advanced humectants deliver powerful hydration to help keep lips moist and supple.

products.name: Desert Sun Lipgloss
products.description: Lip Plumping Peptide Complex Maxi helps to stimulate collagen for a voluptuous look. Marine Filling Collagen Micro-Spheres instantly plump and hydrate. Mango, Kokam & Shea Butter hydrate and condition the lips while Vitamins A, C & E provide antioxidants to help protect lips from free radical damage.

products.name: Deep Hydration Cream
products.description: A daily moisturizer for intense hydration. A lightweight, quick absorbing cream that transforms skin into a supple, healthier looking appearance.

4.title: Black on Black
4.subtitle: Black On Black™ is beautifully designed clothing & accessories that are both clothing line AND protest sign. Black On Black™ is a social protest on clothing that De:Constructs the Construct.

products.name: "Anti-Racist Social Club" Throw Pillows
products.description: These cozy throw pillows feature high-quality fabric and prints that will upgrade your space. Zippered cover care instructions: machine wash in cold water using mild detergent and gentle cycle only, hang to dry.

products.name: "Juneteenth" - Unisex T
products.description: Juneteenth is the oldest known celebration commemorating the ending of slavery in the United States.  Dating back to 1865, it was on June 19th that the Union soldiers, led by Major General Gordon Granger, landed at Galveston, Texas with news that the war had ended and that the enslaved were now free.

products.name: "Energy I Be On AKA Black Powered" - Unisex Long-Sleeved T
products.description: "Black Powered" T-Shirt - When I think about the greatness of us and all that we've been able to become DESPITE all that we've been through and STILL going through, one reason that is specific to us is, US.

5.title: Open Yale Courses: African American History: From Emancipation to the Present
5.subtitle: The purpose of this course is to examine the African American experience in the United States from 1863 to the present. Prominent themes include the end of the Civil War and the beginning of Reconstruction; African Americans’ urbanization experiences; the development of the modern civil rights movement and its aftermath; and the thought and leadership of Booker T. Washington, Ida B. Wells-Barnett, W.E.B. Du Bois, Marcus Garvey, Martin Luther King Jr., and Malcolm X.

5.title: Frederick Douglass
5.subtitle: Frederick Douglass was an escaped slave who became a prominent activist, author and public speaker.

6.title: KAZMALEJE
6.subtitle: At KAZMALEJE (pronounced cosmology), we are dedicated to creating innovative, lifestyle-amplifying tools and accessories to improve our customers' hair care and beauty regimens.

products.name: KurlsPlus Paddle Comb
products.description: Our KurlsPlus Paddle Comb is great for detangling all hair types, lengths and thickness. It is the ultimate power tool that will allow you to detangle, blow dry, massage and style all in ONE!

products.name: KurlsPlus Pick
products.description: Our KurlsPlus Pick is great for short cuts or adding volume after a braid out, twist out or roller set. It's the ideal styling companion for travelers or on-the-go curlistas who need to refresh their hair throughout the day.

products.name: KurlsPlus Comb
products.description: Meet our KurlsPlus Comb. Our Comb is great for detangling hair of all lengths that is normal to thick in density with minimal stress on your hair whether wet or dry. It's also great for raking through heat styled curls to create a feathered look or detangling wigs/extensions without disrupting the curl pattern too much resulting in unwanted frizz.

6.title: Pod Save the People Podcast
6.subtitle: On Pod Save the People, DeRay Mckesson explores news, culture, social justice, and politics with Sam Sinyangwe, Kaya Henderson and De’Ara Balenger. They offer a unique take on the news, with a special focus on overlooked stories and topics that often impact people of color.

7.title: NAACP Legal Defense and Education Fund
7.subtitle: Through litigation, advocacy, and public education, LDF seeks structural changes to expand democracy, eliminate disparities, and achieve racial justice in a society that fulfills the promise of equality for all Americans. LDF also defends the gains and protections won over the past 75 years of civil rights struggle and works to improve the quality and diversity of judicial and executive appointments.

7.title: Loza Tam
7.subtitle: Shop our collection of women's African Head Wraps. All of our head wraps & turbans are lined in satin to protect the hair against frizz, breakage and moisture loss.

products.name: Black Satin Head Wrap
products.description: Black, Pre-tied Satin Turban Head Wrap is made completely of black satin to prevent friction between the cotton fabric and your fragile hair strands. Features an elastic band in the back to ensure a the turban stays secure on your head.

products.name: Faiza Turban Headband
products.description: Black, purple, and lemon yellow headband is lined in black satin to prevent friction between the cotton fabric and your fragile hair strands.  Turban headband is perfect to wear on your next Peloton ride or wear it casually on your next Zoom meeting.

products.name: Lulu African Headband
products.description: Black, white, and grey African Printed Head Wrap Headband is lined in black satin to prevent friction between the cotton fabric and your fragile hair strands. Perfect to wear on your next Peloton ride or wear it casually on your next Zoom meeting.

8.title: Accountability in a Time of Justice
8.subtitle: Accountability is a well-worn word in social justice circles. We have worked hard to figure out what accountability means to us as we attempt to walk our social justice talk.

8.title: White Privilege: Unpacking the Invisible Knapsack
8.subtitle: As a white person, I realized I had been taught about racism as something that puts others at a disadvantage, but had been taught not to see one of its corollary aspects, white privilege, which puts me at an advantage.

9.title: Beija Flor Naturals
9.subtitle: Beija-Flor Naturals has nearly a decade as a Curly Girl favorite product line in addition to skincare that is effective, exotic and unique in the green beauty market.

products.name: Body and Hair Honey
products.description: Moisturizing Butter + Oils blend to give a nourishing sheen to skin and hair.  Only a little goes a long way and the fragrance is divine.

products.name: Acai Mango Lotion
products.description: The acai mango lotion is a rich and creamy facial moisturizer that is perfect for all skin types. This water-based product absorbs perfectly, and includes the all powerful acai and mango extracts, murumuru butter, rosemary and orange essential oils.

products.name: Handmade Soy Candle: Plum
products.description: Juicy Fruit fragrance without being too sticky sweet. This plum inspired candle features notes of peace, apple, strawberry, jasmine and vanilla.  Clean burning soy candle. 90 Hour Burn Time.

9.title: Coral Oral
9.subtitle: Not only are these toothbrushes more aesthetically pleasing, you differentiate each brush by its pattern and not by its color. Our company is proudly black owned and highlights oral health facts including a Black history fact that we all should know!

products.name: Medium 4-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Soft Single-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Soft bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Medium Single-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

10.title: Support the Milwaukee Freedom Fund
10.subtitle: The Milwaukee Freedom Fund is extending support to protestors in Kenosha, WI. Their mission is to build on ongoing bail abolition efforts, support immigration efforts, work towards Black and Brown Liberation, and support Black and Brown young people as they build a new world.

10.title: Revisionist History: Miss Buchanan’s Period of Adjustment
10.subtitle: Revisionist History is a podcast from Malcolm Gladwell and Pushkin Industries.In this episode: A landmark Supreme Court case. A civil rights revolution. Why has everyone forgotten what happened next?

11.title: Implicit Bias -- how it effects us and how we push through
11.subtitle: Everyone makes assumptions about people they don’t know. Melanie Funchess will teach us to recognize these assumptions and work toward a common understanding.

11.title: MLK: The Other America
11.subtitle: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.’s 1967 speech at Stanford. Here, he expounds on his nonviolent philosophy and methodology.

12.title: Microaggressions Matter
12.subtitle: They may not always be ill-intentioned, but the slights illuminate deeper problems in America.

12.title: Ban or Restrict Tear Gas
12.subtitle: The use of tear gas has been banned and is illegal in war. This same tear gas is used by the law enforcement, to control unarmed crowds protesting for the BLM movement. Tear gas is also used for border control and is thrown at innocent migrants who are unarmed and pose no sudden threat to anyone in the vicinity.

13.title: Dr. Ernest Everett Just
13.subtitle: Dr. Ernest Just was a pioneering African American biologist, academic and science writer. Just's primary legacy is his recognition of the fundamental role of the cell surface in the development of organisms.

13.title: How the Negro National League Was Formed | Field of Dreams...Deferred
13.subtitle: The Negro National League debuted 100 years ago with world-class players and legions of fans. Hear how founder Rube Foster formed the league in Part 1 of "Field of Dreams...Deferred," a four-part series from TBS.

14.title: Red Bay Coffee
14.subtitle: Red Bay Coffee is at the forefront of what we believe is the fourth wave of coffee—a firm commitment to ensure coffee production is not only high quality and sustainable, but a vehicle for diversity, inclusion, social and economic restoration, entrepreneurship, and environmental sustainability. We are foodies, artists, activists, community folk, and innovators who love, love, love what we do.

products.name: East Fourteenth
products.description: Tanzanian Dark Roast - Blackberry, Dark Chocolate, Date  East Fourteenth is an homage to a past heritage and a link to history in the making. It is the story of Oakland’s wide-reaching cultures and creeds.

products.name: Coffee Mug - Africa's Gift (Black)

products.name: Unisex Sweatshirt - Red Bay Spoon Logo - Gold

14.title: Reconstruction in America
14.subtitle: Read the Equal Justice Initiative's report on racial violence after the Civil War, from 1865-1876.

products.name: Leave-In Detangling Conditioner

products.description: This Leave in formula will leave your curls soft, moisturized and bouncy. Great on all curl types, can be used to define curls, twist and reactivate curls.

products.name: Bailee's Bundle

products.name: My Beauty Secret is Gratitude
products.description: You've now found the staple t-shirt of your wardrobe. It's made of a thicker, heavier cotton, but it's still soft and comfy. And the double stitching on the neckline and sleeves add more durability to what is sure to be a favorite!

16.title: How the Dodgers 'Took' Jackie Robinson | Field of Dreams...Deferred Part 3
16.subtitle: Brooklyn Dodgers executive Branch Rickey signed Jackie Robinson from the Kansas City Monarchs in 1945, but he refused to pay Negro League teams for their players. Watch more on the fight to integrate MLB in "Field of Dreams...Deferred" Part 3.

16.title: Adwoa Beauty
16.subtitle: Adwoa beauty is a modern, non toxic, gender neutral beauty brand catering to multi-cultural hair textures. Buying hair products is a choice, not a command. We are committed to being transparent with our ingredients.

17.title: Southern Elegance Candle Co.

18.title: The Bail Project
18.subtitle: The Bail Project™ National Revolving Bail Fund is on a mission to combat mass incarceration and reshape the pretrial system in the United States. 100% of online donations are used to bring people home. Since bail money comes back to us when cases close, we're able to recycle every dollar donated at least twice per year.

18.title: Martin Luther King Jr.’s ‘Letter From Birmingham Jail’
18.subtitle: In April 1963, King was jailed in Birmingham, Alabama. While there, he wrote a lengthy letter in the margins of a newspaper, and smuggled it out with the help of his lawyer. The eloquent call for “constructive, nonviolent tension” to force an end to unjust laws became a landmark document of the civil-rights movement.

19.title: CurlyCoilyTresses
19.subtitle: At CurlyCoilyTresses, we create products that help soothe scalps and moisturize and hydrate hair. We've helped thousands just like you to lengthen and strengthen their hair; soften, moisturize and hydrate their hair; and improve the overall appearance of their hair.

products.name: Enrich Moisturizer Styler + Organic Pumpkin Seed Oil Serum + Nourish Treatment Masque
products.description: Our best selling kit! Our customers say our products leave their hair soft, hydrated, moisturized and touchably luscious! And you get all this without fragrance headaches! 19.title: Constance Baker Motley: Judiciary’s Unsung Rights Hero
19.subtitle: Constance Baker Motley was an unlikely civil rights hero. An African American who grew up near Yale University, she did not personally experience overt racism until late in high school, and as a young person she was almost totally unaware of black history.

20.title: glAze

Our mission is to provide styles that flow with you from moment to moment, whether you’re making a quick run to the grocery store or meeting the girls for brunch. With comfort and quality in mind, we make looking lavish easy. Look good, feel good.

products.name: Effortless Cotton Joggers

21.title: Ashay by the Bay

She opened the business in 2000 and started selling books online in 2002, establishing Ashay by the Bay as a Book Reseller that Specializes in African American and Multi-Cultural Children’s Books, Baby-3 and K-12 for Schools and Organizations.  We sell a Diverse Selection of books to both the Consumer and Business Markets and we Build Custom Collections for School and Classroom Libraries.  We also sell Gift Cards provide and we are the publishers of the Mindful Messages Curriculum.  Our home office is located in Vallejo, California. and we sell books throughout the US, Canada and select Markets around the world.

23.title: Remembering South African leader Nelson Mandela
23.subtitle: Nelson Mandela, the first black president of South Africa credited with ending apartheid there, died in Johannesburg on Dec. 5, 2013. Former PBS NewsHour correspondent Charlayne Hunter-Gault takes a look back at Mandela's life and legacy.

24.title: Designs by Tee LLC
24.subtitle: Brooklyn Social Worker designing positive t-shirts and apparel. Supporting homeless children and families in NYC.

24.title: Justice for Lakeith Smith
24.subtitle: Lakeith Smith, now 20, was charged with the murder of his friend, A’Donte Washington when he was only 15— a crime he did not commit. A'donte died at the hands of a policeman, after the police fired 4 rounds into him - and he currently walks free.

25.title: Naja Tea
25.subtitle: At Naja Tea, we stand for quality, integrity, and curiosity. We strive daily to maintain high standards in every aspect of our business. Our mission is to provide a positive, significant, and sensational experience with Naja Tea.

products.name: Brew-In-Cup with Stainless Infuser & Lid

products.name: Biscotti Bites
products.description: A traditional Biscotti recipe modernized using organic, wholesome ingredients and served in smaller, melt-in-your-mouth, bite-sized pieces.

25.title: How colorism shapes our standards of beauty
25.subtitle: When Chika Okoro read the casting call for one of her favorite films, she noticed that actresses with darker skin were assigned lesser roles —prompting her to address a phenomenon she'd experienced all her life: colorism. In this eye-opening talk, Okoro shares coping strategies along with steps that could help eliminate this insidious and destructive mindset of discrimination.

26.title: How studying privilege systems can strengthen compassion
26.subtitle: Her TED Talk offers a shift in the traditional view of race, equity and privilege. McIntosh uses her own experience as a white woman to inform her own knowledge of racial experiences from a white perspective.

26.title: Controversy over Confederate monuments is overdue
26.subtitle: As Confederate monuments and memorials are toppled across the United States, Stanford historian James T. Campbell says it is important to think historically not only about the past but also about our own time and what future generations might say about us.

27.title: Bossa Bars
27.subtitle: Energy bars formulated for women perimenopause to post to help support daily nutritional needs and keep that sneaky extra 10 pounds under control!

27.title: Why Protests and Riots Work
27.subtitle: Riots are destructive, dangerous, and scary — but can lead to serious social reforms. To prevent more violent uprisings and protests, we need to take their causes seriously.

28.title: Seeing White Podcast Series
28.subtitle: Just what is going on with white people? Police shootings of unarmed African Americans. Acts of domestic terrorism by white supremacists. The renewed embrace of raw, undisguised white-identity politics. Unending racial inequity in schools, housing, criminal justice, and hiring. Some of this feels new, but in truth it’s an old story.

28.title: Support our Young Protest Leaders #freetianna
28.subtitle: On Tuesday, July 21, Tianna Arata was arrested by San Luis Obispo PD at about 8 p.m. near Mitchell Park as she and other demonstrators were loading up a car after the protest had already dispersed.

products.name: Ultimate Beard Kit
products.description: The Koils by Nature Beard Kit is an all-natural and certified vegan line of skin and hair care products developed exclusively for men. Gentle enough to use every day, and infused with soft, fresh scents, the kit includes the dual-action beard and face cleanser and shaving foam, a moisturizer, beard butter, and oil. When used regularly, each item works together to give your skin the moisture and healing it needs, so your beard can thrive - and look good as it grows. If you’ve experienced a dry, patchy beard, or are ready to finally see those pesky razor bump scars go away, we’ve got you!

products.name: Nourishing Hair and Body Butter Marvelous Mango
products.description: Nourishing Hair & Body Butter is made from the best butters & oils nature provides, it will moisturize, revitalize, heal, and protect your hair and skin. The lightly scented fresh mango scent will have you thinking of a tropical island! This butter smells delightful, please do not ingest, for external use only.

products.name: Sage & Lemongrass Collection
products.description: Moisturized hair is healthy hair. When your natural hair is dry, it's frustrating and feels like a problem you'll never solve. Our Sage & Lemongrass Collection offers the hydration your dehydrated curls need.

30.title: Oh-Mazing!
30.subtitle: Yes, we sell granola (it's quite tasty), but more importantly, we want to inspire you to live your life with purpose, passion, and to follow your dreams. Our products are here to bring the adventure back to snacking, and better yet, celebrate YOU when those dreams are achieved.

products.name: Original Recipe
products.description: The Original Recipe blend has a sweet caramel flavor that makes it simply delicious. There are so many ways to enjoy this treat--topping on your yogurt, adding some crunch to your favorite ice cream, or creating a crust for a cheesecake.

products.name: Lemon Bar
products.description: Lemon Bar will please the palate of all lemon lovers and add a refreshing flavor to a bowl of oatmeal or a new bite to your favorite cheesecake recipe.

products.name: Caribbean Delight
products.description: Caribbean Delight is our first vegan product. The ingredients include coconut oil, grated coconut, and a touch of raisins that will make your palate dance. Not to mention, you will immediately be reminded of that time you went on an island vacation.

30.title: BLK & Bold
30.subtitle: BLK & Bold welcomes the obligation to equip young people with tools to live their best lives and overcome familiar unfortunate circumstances by turning a daily ritual, enjoying a cup of coffee & tea, into a means of giving back. BLK & Bold pledges 5% of its profits to initiatives aligned to sustaining youth programming, enhancing workforce development, and eradicating youth homelessness.

products.name: La Guadalupe, Honduras - Single Origin (Direct Trade), Light Roast
products.description: As these beans are directly sourced from Finca La Guadalupe, this single origin will satisfy your desire for a creamy bodied light roast. With undertones of caramel and honey, this will become your everyday coffee.

products.name: Jasmine Loose Leaf Green Tea
products.description: Satisfy both smell and taste with this Jasmine Tea! Lightly smooth & sweet, it contains green tea leaves absorbed with fragrance from jasmine petals. This produces a cup that is very sensual with floral aromatics

products.name: BLK & Bold Logo Dad Hats
products.description: 2020 BLK & Bold Logo Dad Hat. Black/White/Yellow
